description: Fix the divide function to correctly divide a by b instead of dividing by 0, and also fix the add function which was incorrectly multiplying instead of adding. These are critical bugs that would cause runtime errors (ZeroDivisionError) and incorrect calculations. - Fix the divide function to divide by the parameter b instead of hardcoded 0, preventing ZeroDivisionError

metadata.solution_description: Fix the divide function to correctly divide a by b instead of dividing by 0, and also fix the add function which was incorrectly multiplying instead of adding. These are critical bugs that would cause runtime errors (ZeroDivisionError) and incorrect calculations.
